作業場所節: (さぎょうばしょせつ) - working-storage section
作業手順: (さぎょうてじゅん) - work procedure; operational procedure
作業現場: (さぎょうげんば) - job site; workplace
作業環境: (さぎょうかんきょう) - work environment
作業用: (さぎょうよう) - for work; for manufacturing
作業療法: (さぎょうりょうほう) - occupational therapy
作業療法士: (さぎょうりょうほうし) - occupational therapist
作業監督者: (さぎょうかんとくしゃ) - operation supervisor
作業者: (さぎょうしゃ) - operator; worker; maker
作業要員: (さぎょうよういん) - work force
作業道: (さぎょうどう) - auxiliary logging road
作業部会案: (さぎょうぶかいあん) - working draft; working draught
作業量: (さぎょうりょう) - workload; quantity of work; work rate; units produced
作業領域: (さぎょうりょういき) - workspace; working area
作歌: (さっか) - writing songs or poems; poem
作況指数: (さっきょうしすう) - rice-crop index
作法: (さくほう) - (さほう only) manners/etiquette/propriety; manner of production (esp. of prose, poetry, etc.)/way of making
作物所: (つくもどころ) - palace workshop responsible for making furnishings, etc. (Heian period)
作用反作用の法則: (さようはんさようのほうそく) - action-reaction law (Newton's third law of motion)
作用点: (さようてん) - point of action (e.g. of a lever)
作用角: (さよかく) - working angle/angle of action; (camshaft) duration
作画崩壊: (さくがほうかい) - inconsistently, horribly drawn animated film or cartoon; animated cartoon episode of lower picture quality than other episodes in the same series
作編曲: (さくへんきょく) - composition and arrangement
作者未詳: (さくしゃみしょう) - anonymous; author unknown
作詞作曲: (さくしさっきょく) - songwriting (words and music)
作詞家: (さくしか) - lyric writer; lyricist; songwriter
作詞者: (さくししゃ) - lyric writer; lyricist; songwriter
作陶: (さくとう) - porcelain making; ceramics making; pottery making
佝僂: (くる) - rickets; someone suffering from rickets
佞む: (かたむ) - to deceive/to fool/to lie; to commit adultery
佞人: (ねいじん) - flatterer; smooth talker; crafty person
佞武多: (ねぶた) - Nebuta; nighttime festival in Tohoku (esp. Aomori)
佞者: (ねいしゃ) - smooth talker; crafty person
佩: (はい) - Traje, antiga decoração de cinto oriental; contador para espadas
佩く: (はく) - (usu 履く or 穿く) to put on (or wear) lower-body clothing (i.e. pants, skirt, etc.)/to put on (or wear) footwear; (usu. 佩く or 帯く) to affix a sword to one's hip; to affix a bowstring to a bow
佩びる: (おびる) - to wear; to put on (a sword)
佳い: (よい) - (also いい (all senses)) good/excellent/fine/nice/pleasant/agreeable; sufficient (can be used to turn down an offer)/ready/prepared; profitable (e.g. deal, business offer, etc.)/beneficial; OK
佳人薄命: (かじんはくめい) - (yoji) beauties die young; beauty and luck seldom go together
佳境: (kakyou) - parte mais interessante (de uma história), clímax, parte boa; ponto turístico, lugar bonito
佳日: (かじつ) - auspicious day; good day; lucky day; beautiful day
